channel.title: /V/Scape - An Oldschool Player's Love
channel.description:
[img]http://vscape.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/start/vscapelogo/medium.jpg[/img]
[b][size=20pt]DOWNLOAD: [url=http://www.upload.ee/files/4519470/vidyascape_3.4f.jar.html]http://www.upload.ee/files/4519470/vidyascape_3.4f.jar.html[/url][/size][/b]
What is /v/scape? /v/scape is a private server created and hosted by /v/irgins for /v/irgins. What is the exp rate? 2.25x
Most recent updates (check in-game with ::patchnotes): =January 28th= -Nature Spirit -New server and higher stability (TYB ODEL) -Hiscores reformat to show total exp. -Enfeeble rune cost fixed.
Staff: Pickles (God-king of /v/scape, all hail Pikol) Telescope (Great looking!) Mr Foxter (Yiff!) Odel (Hosts the server now, based as fudge) Bobster (Gave us the current client, landwhale lubber) Noiryx (ayy lmao)
[img]http://i.imgur.com/okUhi4o.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/uraktPQ.png[/img]
[b][size=20pt]DOWNLOAD: [url=http://www.upload.ee/files/4519470/vidyascape_3.4f.jar.html]http://www.upload.ee/files/4519470/vidyascape_3.4f.jar.html[/url][/size][/b]

item.title: /V/Scape - An Oldschool Player's Love
item.dc:creator: @furyking50 furyking50
item.description:
@furyking50 wrote:

Ive joined the server and it had players idk about about now but it seems like they have players but don’t advertise…

item.title: /V/Scape - An Oldschool Player's Love
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

RealVScape:

Go on the server, I just took the picture. LOL.

Don’t mean to be a dick but…
No, nothing is attracting me to play; so why would I want to? That’s what you have to realise, which will then help you create a better advertisement which means more people will join :rolleyes: :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: /V/Scape - An Oldschool Player's Love
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Please, tell me; what would make me want to join this server? Show me what will attract my attention and perhaps get me to play your server. Making advertisements with absolute bullshit and one picture of the fake “online players” list.
Nevertheless, good luck.

Read full topic
